name: Hill
description: Rolling hills provide gentle terrain for travel and farming, offering good visibility without the dangers of mountains. The varied elevation creates natural defensive positions, while hidden valleys can conceal settlements or bandit camps.
atmosphere: Rolling landscape with gentle rise and fall rhythm. Each hill reveals new vistas. Wind creates grass waves and carries distant wildlife sounds. Gentle elevation without mountain harshness. Hidden valleys create discovery around every bend. Fresh air scented of grass, wildflowers, and rich soil.
